component.name: crystal-facet-uml
component.summary: crystal-facet-uml creates diagrams to document system and software architecture

description.p: As software architect, you create a set of diagrams describing use-cases, requirements, structural views, behavioral and deployment views.

crystal-facet-uml keeps element names and element hierarchies consistent. It exports diagrams in svg, pdf, ps and png formats to be used in text processing systems like DocBook, html, LaTeX. crystal-facet-uml exports the model to xmi format.
